H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H1416.def: = a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army

H1413.def: = causative action by which humans inflict wounds on their body with a knife, ► as a sign of mourning, or in order to reinforce one's prayer

H4692.def: = state of severe sorrow or anguish

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3895.def: = the lower bony structure of the skull of humans and certain animals that forms the framework of the mouth and holds the teeth

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

81.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H1035.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► ancestral town of King {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H6810.def: literally: small; hence: = state in which humans are considered unworthy of honor and respect

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4910.def: = state in which humans are similar in shape, behavior or experience to others

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H4163.def: literally: goings out; hence: = a reference to the moment that someone's family line begins

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H3499.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H5797.def: = state in which an object is able to withstand force

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1431.def: = process by which objects increase in size

H759.def: = building or part of a building that has been fortified to provide additional security; often connected to the palace

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H8083.def: = state in which a countable entity is eight in number

H5257.def: = action by which humans pour out a liquid, such as {L:wine<SDBH:יַיִן>}, {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, or even {L:blood<SDBH:דָּם>} before a deity ► as a sacrifice

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H5248.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Cush<SDBH:כּוּשׁ>}; descendant of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► considered the first mighty warrior on earth and the founder and ruler of several of the great cities of old

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H7241.def: = a brief and usually light fall of rain; ≈ regarded as a blessing

H3176.def: = action by which humans delay action until the right moment, with a certain amount of confidence that this moment will actually come

H3293.def: = a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals

H5739.def: = a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7429.def: = action by which humans, deities, or animals tread heavily and noisily on people, plants, or objects; ► usually with the purpose of killing, destroying, desecrating, and/or humiliating

H2963.def: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H5337.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from a situation where it could be damaged

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H4818.def: = open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H2040.def: = state in which something is in extreme disrepair ◄ caused by either neglect or destruction

H4013.def: = area that has been fortified with the help of a strong and solid wall and possibly other defense works; ≈ associated with security

H3785.def: = action by which humans make an effort to gain control over humans, animals, or deities ◄ through rituals and incantations

H6049.def: = action by which someone foretells future events by using magic, casting spells, or conjuring up spirits; forbidden by the Law of Moses

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H6456.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ carved out of wood and sometimes stone, ► and functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H4676.def: = the part of a tree trunk left projecting from the ground after the rest has fallen or been felled

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

H4639.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H842.def: = female deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites, and symbolized with a wooden pole

H8045.def: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

H5359.def: = action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H2534.def: = poisonous fluid; ◄ secreted by serpents, scorpions, etc. and introduced into body of victim by bite or sting; ► used by these animals to kill their prey and/or defend themselves against their natural enemies; ≈ often used to denote suffering and injury in a more general sense as well
